message: Did You ask yourself a Question ... Why Mac Apps are so beautiful ??

data.message: Actually no! can you tell us why?
Because they are simple & focused , not overcrowded as windows apps ..
you are correct in this actually :) but you know some times you need a complicated app to do a punch of actions rather than having 10 installed apps. but I totally agree with your point.

Sure you need set of actions, but that depend on what you do actually, so if you work with a huge team ... each one specified at one or two tasks, and here comes the native & simple apps, but if you work alone or on small team ... you need complex software or may be whole systems to do all the job.
this example works better for developers and software engineers, but i think on design it differs
I agree with you :) BTW: I'm starting to use MAC so it will be very helpful if you can share helpful applications :)
Generally I'm interested with IT as a whole, but specifically i use prototyping, wireframing & designing software ... Both for Mac & Windows
I do the same also but only on windows may be you can tell me about prototyping apps on MAC :)
i used to work with Mockflow, but Now I prefer Pencil... , for a Mac user get OmniGraffle
